item.title: Top 5 Forex Profiles
item.description: Social media provide a lot of information that can be used to interpret sentiment of the market and it can help to predict currency price, a lot of Twitter profiles attract thousands of followers giving them “Signals”, information about the forex market if they should buy, sell or be neutral. The main goal of this project is to find the best 5 profiles on Twitter regarding forex financial market, the profiles with higher accuracy in their prediction.
